concept.title: Try Out Your Eucalyptus FastStart Installation

conbody.p: Your FastStart installation includes a default CentOS 5 image. This section describes how to launch an instance from this image and connect to that instance. The tasks listed in the follow sections require a network connection.
conbody.note: Before you can use the commands that follow, set up your environment variables by sourcing the eucarc file. On the Frontend enter the following command: source /root/creds/eucarc.
